alert.note: Alert for Covington; Jefferson Davis (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 4:27PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Covington and southeastern Jefferson Davis Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 427 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Melba, or 9 miles southwest of Collins, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Covington and southeastern Jefferson Davis Counties, including the following locations... Bassfield and Seminary. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
